The Oblitercons/Nemesis Enforcer/Punch:





Pyro, Hiss, and Scavenger approached Chaostaur's fallen body cautiously, 
weapons still aimed at him.  "Is he dead?" Scavenger asked.

Hiss did some small scans, still detecting energy from Chaostaur.  "No.  At 
least not yet," he said, charging up his fusion cannon.

"Orders?" Dark One asked Nemesis Enforcer.

Nemesis stood his full height of about seven feet, approximately the same as 
Dark One.  He outstretched his wings to their full span, trying to look as 
fearsome as possible.  "There is only one group of beings diabolical enough 
to try such an attack upon the ruler of the Alliance.  The Neo Decepticons."
